column1: GK^If you had pogonophobia what would you be afraid of?^Beards

GK^Which country grows the most fruit?^China
GK^Which company is owned by Bill Gates?^Microsoft
GK^What would you do with a maris piper?^Eat it - it’s a potato

GK^In fable who sold a cow for five beans?^Jack
